Name: Castle Mascot
About the game: DId you ever dream to have a castle? Let's stand a castle on your computer's desktop! It has a weather system that will be the SAME from your city. Sunny, cloudy, rainy, snowy... The weather will update every hour. And the time of the castle is synchronize from real time of yours! Fireworks every hour during night time! A team of cavalry runs out from the castle every half hours. Where will they go? Melodious sound from bell tower every hour... And more features to be discovered! Have fun!
